name: Yukio Oikawa
effect: [All Turns] When one of your Digimon with [Myotismon] in its name is deleted, you may suspend this Tamer to gain 1 memory.[End of Opponent's Turn] If this Tamer is suspended, you may delete this Tamer to play 1 [MaloMyotismon] from your trash without paying its memory cost.
security_effect: [Security] Play this card without paying its memory cost.
